thread.title: Pumpkin Spice Latte Available at Starbucks Starting Tuesday amp;#8195;
thread.title_full: Pumpkin Spice Latte Available at Starbucks Starting Tuesday amp;#8195;

title: Pumpkin Spice Latte Available at Starbucks Starting Tuesday amp;#8195;
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
8 Sep 2015 12:34 PM EST 
It's a sign that summer is coming to an end. Beginning Tuesday, the Pumpkin Spice Latte will be available at Starbucks. Starbucks said it answered customer demands by removing the artificial flavors and colors and adding real pumpkin for the first time. Peter Dukes, director of Espresso and Brewed Coffee for Starbucks said, "After hearing from customers and partners about ingredients, we took another look at this beverage and why we created it so many years ago." Starbucks said the drink is a seasonal favorite.
